mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT name,lat,lnt FROM tourist_spot s JOIN (SELECT SUM(JAN+FEB+MAR+APR+MAY+JUN+JUL+AUG+SEP+OCT+NOV+DEC) as total,no FROM tourist_spot_popularity GROUP BY NO) p ON s.no=p.no WHERE sregion=#{region} ORDER BY total desc) WHERE rownum <=5
SELECT distinct sregion from place_loc ORDER BY sregion
